Name: Exterminator Cartridge
Used With: Any Melee or Ranged weapon with the Two-Handed Trait.
Effects: Flamer attached to the weapon. Can be used as an Action as a Ranged Attack. Once fired, the Cartridge is expended and takes 5 minutes to replace or reload. Reloads are Common and cost 5 solars.

Name: Melee Attachment
Used With: Any Ranged Weapon with the Two-Handed Trait.
Effects: Functions as a Sword and can be affixed or removed as an Action. While not attached, counts as a Knife.

Name: Mono-edge
Effects: Gives Penetrating (2) Trait, or increasing the rating by 2 if weapon already has the Trait. At the GM's discretion, can be used on other mundane weapons.

Name: Photo Sight/Omnispex
Used With: Any Ranged Weapon without the Blast, or Flamer Traits.
Effects: Removes Disavdantage when firing into a Zone that is Dark or Poorly Lit.

Name: Laser Sight
Used With: Any Ranged Weapon without the Blast, or Flamer Traits.
Effects: Adds +1 SL to Ranged Attacks made with the weapon, but targets have Advantage on Awareness Tests to spot the wielder. If the target sees the red-dot, they may attempt to Dodge the ranged attack. The sight may be switched on or off once per round as a Free Action.

Name: Telescopic Sight/Omniscope
Used With: Any Ranged Weapon without the Blast, or Flamer Traits.
Effects: Increases Range by one step, but removes Close Trait. Can be used as Magnoculars.

Name: Backpack Ammo Supply
Effects: Quadruples linked weapon's magazine size. Adds +2 Encumbrance when worn. Takes 5 minutes to reload. If you suffer a Critical Hit while wearing it, roll 1d10. On 7+, the Backpack detonates, dealing double the weapon's damage to your Torso, and is permanently destroyed. Enough ammo to fill the Backpack costs four times the listed price for reloads for the linked weapon.

Name: Bipod
Effects: Allows weapon with Heavy trait to brace anywhere.

Name: Fire Selector
Used With: Bolt, Launcher, Low-Tech, and Solid Projectile ranged weapons
Effects: Choose to load up to three different ammunition types. Divide magazine as desired. Can switch between loaded ammunition as a Free action. Removes Reliable Trait.

Name: Silencer
Effects: Removes Weapon's Loud Trait while attached.
